meanings.sent1: Those yutzes never listen to good advice.
meanings.sent2: He always hangs out with a bunch of yutzes.
meanings.sent3: The yutzes at the party kept spilling their drinks everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The city was overrun by yutzes, causing chaos and confusion.
meanings.sent5: The yutzes in the story were portrayed as comical characters.

meanings.definition: To behave in a foolish or contemptible manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop yutzing around and focus on your work.
meanings.sent2: She tends to yutzes when she's nervous.
meanings.sent3: The kids yutzed their way through the game, making silly mistakes.
meanings.sent4: He yutzes through life without a care in the world.
meanings.sent5: Yutzing about won't solve your problems; take action instead.
